description: This Python script demonstrates how to use Azure OpenAI Tools with the Agno framework, including setting up agents with different models and tools, and generating images based on user prompts.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools, capable of generating responses.

classes.name: AzureOpenAI
classes.description: Represents an Azure-hosted OpenAI model with specific deployment parameters.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents a standard OpenAI chat model.

classes.name: AzureOpenAITools
classes.description: Provides tools for interacting with Azure OpenAI services, such as image generation.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response generated by the agent, optionally formatted in markdown.
